articles.title: 70th Anniversary of UAWK Observed
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of UAWK Observed
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) greeted its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The union is the massive political organization of socialist agricultural workers remaining true to the idea and cause of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the leader.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the union on Jan. 31, Juche 35 (1946) on the basis of the shining tradition of building a revolutionary organization of farmers established by him in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and wisely led the union to successfully carry out the idea and line of the WPK on socialist rural construction in each period and at each stage of the developing revolution.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided important guidelines to bring about a turn in the work of the union and wisely led it to fulfill its mission and duty as an ideological and educational organization, bestowing great loving care and trust on it.
					
					 A meeting to mark the anniversary took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday.
					
					 Present there were Yang Hyong Sop, Kwak Pom Gi and Ri Chol Man, vice-premier and minister of Agriculture, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the WPK Central Committee, officials concerned, officials of the union and agricultural workers.
					
					 A congratulatory message the WPK Central Committee sent to the organizations at all levels and officials and members of the union was read out at the meeting.
					
					 The message said that the union has developed into a mass political organization and successfully fulfilled its mission and duty under the wise guidance and meticulous care of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu for the past seven decades.
					
					 It said that the organizations at all levels and officials and members of the union have made great achievements in the drive to develop it into militant ranks remaining faithful to the party and the leader and carry out the party's policy of agriculture.

articles.title: Art Performance Given to Mark Anniversary of Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea
articles.content:
Art Performance Given to Mark Anniversary of Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and members of the art groups at the People's Palace of Culture on Sunday, the 70th founding anniversary of the union.
					 The performance began with chorus revolutionary hymn "Ode to General Kim Jong Un". Put on the stage were chorus "Song of Plowing", poem and story-telling "Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu and Union of Agricultural Workers" and other numbers.
					
					 The performers sang in high praises of the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who realized the long-cherished desire of the Korean farmers and set a brilliant example in socialist rural construction.
					
					 Also put on the stage were numbers showing a fresh history of changes which is being made in building modern socialist rural villages under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Among the audience were Yang Hyong Sop, Kwak Pom Gi, Ri Chol Man, vice-premier and minister of Agriculture, Ri Il Hwan, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials concerned, officials of the union and agricultural workers.

articles.title: Belarusian President Hopes for Boosting Cooperative Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Belarusian President Hopes for Boosting Cooperative Relations with DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- DPRK Ambassador Kim Hyong Jun presented his credentials to Belarusian President Aleksandr Lukashenko on Jan. 25.
					 The president said that Belarus would boost the cordial, close and mutually beneficial cooperative relations with the DPRK in all fields.
					
					 He sincerely hoped that everything will go well in the friendly DPRK.

articles.title: Congratulatory Messages, Letters to Kim Jong Un from Different Countries
articles.content:
Congratulatory Messages, Letters to Kim Jong Un from Different Countries
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received congratulatory messages and letters from high-ranking officials of the political, social, military and economic circles of many countries and representatives of international bodies, Juche idea study organizations, organizations for supporting Korea's reunification and friendship organizations on the occasion of the New Year, Juche 105 (2016).
					 The congratulatory messages and letters said that the year 2015 was the historic year in which the Korean people won a shining victory in defending socialism and building a thriving nation and splendidly celebrated the 70th anniversaries of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and Korea's liberation under the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They expressed belief that the Korean people would register fresh victory in building a thriving nation in this significant year when the Seventh Congress of the WPK is to be held.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Accused of Joining U.S. Moves for Germ Warfare
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Accused of Joining U.S. Moves for Germ Warfare
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Bar Association for Democratic Society in south Korea recently made public a document disclosing the fact that the authorities connived at the introduction of germs into south Korea by the U.S. imperialist aggression forces.
					 The document says that the munitions they introduced on April 26, 2015 included anthrax and pest germs.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says in an article Sunday in this regard:
					
					 The south Korean authorities have kept mum about the American master's introduction of germs for six months, while being aware of this fact. This is a heinous crime to realize their ambition to invade the north in collusion with outsiders in utter disregard of the fate of the people.
					
					 What matters is that the south Korean puppet regime reveals its sinister intention to join the U.S. in its moves to provoke a germ warfare against the north while describing the American master's attempt at the germ warfare as the one to cope with "threat of biological weapons" by the north and crying out for "expanding cooperation" with the U.S.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are the traitors without an equal as they are bringing disasters to the nation by zealously joining the U.S. in its moves for the germ warfare, obsessed by their ambition to invade the north.
					
					 The Koreans can never feel relieved even a moment as long as the group of traitors is allowed to go at large as it is becoming frantic in its moves to provoke a war against the north while massively introducing nuclear weapons as well as germ weapons.
					
					 The group of traitors will be cursed and condemned by all the Koreans and sternly punished by history.

articles.title: Japanese Authorities Slammed for Sidestepping State Legal Responsibility for Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese Authorities Slammed for Sidestepping State Legal Responsibility for Crimes Related to Sexual Slavery
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Japanese Prime Minister Abe and other high-ranking government officials vied with each other in making unreasonable remarks that the past issue has been perfectly settled by law through the "agreement" between Japan and south Korea. They also touted that there are no data on forcible drafting by the army and authorities in the document which has been discovered by the government till now and the word sexual slavery is contrary to the fact and should not be used.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says one cannot but ask if the Japanese authorities have a reason and conscience.
					
					 It doesn't make sense that Japan said the issue of sexual slavery has been settled through the "agreement" with south Korea, the commentary says, and notes:
					
					 The victims of sexual slavery are not only in south Korea but in the DPRK and other Asian countries and Europe. In order to settle the issue properly, Japan should admit the state legal and moral responsibility for the crimes related to sexual slavery, make sincere apology and reparation, reinstate all the victims and take measures for preventing the recurrence of the crimes.
					
					 But the Japanese authorities are working hard to sidestep the state legal responsibility.
					
					 Japan is insisting that there is no evidence though a lot of data on the crimes related to sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army have been disclosed. This is an act of making brutes blush.
					
					 It should liquidate its past crimes without condition. This is its unavoidable legal and moral obligation. Japan should bear this in mind and honestly opt for redeeming the past crimes. It will be necessary for its own good.

articles.title: S. Korean Military Accused of Trying to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
S. Korean Military Accused of Trying to Deploy THAAD
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Ministry of Defense in Seoul on Jan. 26 to denounce the military authorities for trying to deploy U.S. THAAD in south Korea.
					 Speakers recalled that the minister of Defense on Jan. 25 said it is necessary to examine the deployment of U.S. THAAD in the military viewpoint.
					
					 This is aimed to spark off a new Cold War in Northeast Asia and inveigle the missile defense system of south Korea into the U.S. MD, they charged.

articles.title: Expert of Russian Academy of Sciences Calls for Settling Nuclear Issue in Korean Peninsula through Talks
articles.content:
Expert of Russian Academy of Sciences Calls for Settling Nuclear Issue in Korean Peninsula through Talks
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Alexandr Vorontsov, section chief of the Institute of Oriental Studies of the Russian Academy of Sciences, in an interview with Radio Sputnik of Russia on Jan. 27 called for settling the nuclear issue in the Korean Peninsula through talks.
					 Before the nuclear deal of Iran takes effect, the U.S. is applying new sanctions on Iran, he said, adding this contradictory situation makes the DPRK more firmly convinced that it cannot trust the U.S. commitment.
					
					 He said that the DPRK is proposing dialogue on an equal footing.
					
					 If the U.S. and its allies do not want this but resort to the strength and sanctions against the DPRK, it will adhere to the present stand, he noted.
					
					 Sanctions cannot make the DPRK stop its nuclear program, he said, adding: It is clear that dialogue is the only way of settling the nuclear issue.

articles.title: DPRK Government's Stand on H-bomb Test Supported by Int'l Body
articles.content:
DPRK Government's Stand on H-bomb Test Supported by Int'l Body
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The International Anti-Imperialism Coordinating Committee issued a statement on Jan. 10 supporting the stand of the DPRK government on its H-bomb test.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test is an exercise of its independent right to defend itself from the aggression by outsiders.
					
					 The U.S. forces with the capacity for nuclear attack have been deployed in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity, increasing the danger of war in the region.
					
					 The DPRK was compelled to strengthen its military muscle to cope with the threat of the enemy armed to the teeth.
					
					 The DPRK has neither invaded nor threatened any country. It raised a proposal for settling the reunification of the country in a peaceful way and has made efforts to carry out it.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S.-led imperialist forces and south Korean authorities which refused to accept the DPRK's proposal for peace and resorted to war threat, harsh economic blockade and moves for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 We express solidarity with the independent right of the DPRK to defend the country and people from the attack of the imperialists.
					
					 The committee denounces the hypocritical stand of the imperialist forces and supports the DPRK bolstering up the capability for self-defense including nuclear deterrent.
					
					 It calls upon all the peace-loving people in the world to denounce the imperialist forces' moves against the DPRK and support it.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Guinea, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Studied in Guinea, Ethiopia
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Reading sessions and round-table talks on the New Year Address of Marshal Kim Jong Un took place at a factory of Guinea and hospitals of Ethiopia between Jan. 16 and 22.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Iran
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Iran
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- An Iranian preparatory committee for celebrating the 74th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Teheran on Jan. 27.
					 The chairman of the Al Hadi Islam Propaganda Organization of Iran was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					  The committee decided to positively introduce the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il and the achievements made by the Korean people in building a thriving socialist nation and organize colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the Russian Association for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 24.
					 Dmitri Kostenko, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Angola
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Angola
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- An Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed on Jan. 25.
					 The director general of the newspaper Eme was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to pay tribute to Kim Jong Il who devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and the people's happiness and organize a film show, photo exhibition, lecture, round-table talks and other colorful events praising his feats on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Ukraine
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Ukraine on Jan. 25.
					 The chairperson of the Dnepropetrovsk branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised by Ukrainian Personage
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Politics Praised by Ukrainian Personage
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The strength-all-powerful doctrine of the imperialists became impotent and Korean socialism is shedding its rays in the international arena thanks to the original Songun politics pursued by leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The chairperson of the Dnepropetrovsk branch of the Ukrainian "Treasured Sword of Songun" Association for the Study of the Juche Idea said this at an inaugural ceremony of the preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il held in Ukraine on Jan. 25.
					
					 The chairperson said:
					
					 The idea and theory of Comrade Kim Jong Il serve as the guidelines of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 He published the works such as "Socialism Is a Science" at a time when the imperialists vociferated about the "complete end of socialism" by taking advantage of the collapse of socialism in some countries and thus instilled the conviction and hope into the world progressives longing for socialism.
					
					 The U.S.-led imperialist reactionaries resorted to the base sanctions and military pressure on socialist Korea to stifle it but it overcame all difficulties and made a leaping forward in building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					  This is the precious fruition of the Songun politics.
